message: Let's start fair and split the money evenly.

This is it, Bob. We're down to the wire.  I'm taking a huge risk here, but I'm hoping you'll see it's in both of our best interests to make a deal.  If we don't, we get nothing.  Let's split it 70/30 and end this.
